title: Remove Share option from header only

requirements.summary: Remove the ShareWebsiteDialog trigger/button from the app header while leaving all other header layout and behavior unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: The header no longer renders the ShareWebsiteDialog trigger/button (i.e., no share icon/button/menu entry is visible in the header).
All other header elements remain the same (logo/home button, navigation items, login/logout button, and mobile menu button still function as before).

file_operations.description: Remove the ShareWebsiteDialog import and the <ShareWebsiteDialog /> render from the header actions area, keeping the surrounding layout/spacing and all other header logic (auth button, nav items, mobile menu toggle) unchanged.
